TestAuthentication.Dialog.fail = False
TestAuthentication.Dialog.m = {b'Password, please:': b'notverysecret',
    b'Are you sure ?': b'yes, of course'}
with TempUser(self.connect().cursor(), 'pymysql_2q@localhost', self.
    databases[0]['db'], 'two_questions', 'notverysecret') as u:
    with self.assertRaises(pymysql.err.OperationalError):
        pymysql.connect(user='pymysql_2q', **self.db)
    pymysql.connect(user='pymysql_2q', auth_plugin_map={b'dialog':
        TestAuthentication.Dialog}, **self.db)
